title: Limitation of liability
context: ยง78-21 Limitation of liability. Except in cases of gross negligence, no public officer or employee shall be liable for damages to government property if such damages to government property were caused by the public officer or employee while performing work within the scope of the officer&rsquo;s or employee&rsquo;s employment.
